shipping.shipping_method_notice:
All orders are shipped Mondayâ€“Friday. Ground Shipping Method ships within 1-5 business days and will arrive within 1-5 business days after order has been shipped. Two-Day or Next-Day Shipping Method (holidays and weekends excluded) ships same day if submitted before 2 pm CST. All Expedited orders placed after 2 pm CST will ship the following business day. Two-Day Orders will arrive in 2 business days. Next-Day orders will arrive the following business day.
All custom pieces will ship within 5-10 business days of an order being processed and are not eligible to ship Expedited.
All orders are shipped via FEDEX SERVICE and cannot be delivered to P.O. Boxes. Shipping Charges are Non-Refundable.
